trans-unit.source: Handles the XML elements used to configure serialization by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: Processa os elementos XML utilizados para configurar a serialização pelo <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of types added to the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de tipos adicionadas para o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes*>propriedade.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DeclaredTypeElementCollection"></xref> that contains the known types.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DeclaredTypeElementCollection"> </xref> que contém os tipos conhecidos.
